description: This header file declares external functions related to an NTP clock component within the ANSC framework, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: AnscCreateNtpClock
methods.description: Creates an NTP clock object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: AnscNtpcoCreate
methods.description: Creates the NTP component object with specified context and handles.

methods.name: AnscNtpcoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified NTP component object.

methods.name: AnscNtpcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects related to the NTP component.
